#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <string.h>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	long long n;
	cin >> t;
	int i,j;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		if (n<4)
		{
			cout << "-1" << endl;
			continue;
		}
		if (n == 4)
		{
			cout << "0" << endl;
			continue;
		}
		long long start = n/7;
		for (i=start; i>0; i--)
		{
			long long temp = n - (7*i);
			if (temp%4 == 0)
				break;
		}
		if (i == 0)
			cout << "-1" << endl;
		else
			cout << 7*i << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
